data.text: A New Way of Making Websites
data.styles: w-full text-3xl font-bold sm:text-4xl

data.text: We are the first platform to offer a website that anyone can build, that runs like a developer made website. Other platforms lack in their customer service and their performance. We fix these major issues and more, with Eclipser.
data.styles: mt-4 w-full text-gray-600
relative mt-3 h-8 w-8

text: Although we offer the quality of a custom website, our page builder costs a fraction of the price at just $15/month.

style.wrapper: flex flex-row space-x-6 text-black px-5 px-5

data.styles: relative mt-3 h-8 w-8

text: All of our themes are made from scratch using our own code. This allows you full control over the design and functionality to better suit your brand.

style.wrapper: flex flex-row space-x-6 text-black px-5 px-5

data.styles: relative mt-3 h-8 w-8

text: The #1 eason visitors will leave a website is if it's slow to load. Our sites are lightning fast, accessible and SEO friendly to rank higher on Google and provide a better user experience.
